name: Fantastical
storyline: In a adorable world full of Fantasy and Imagination lives a 13 year old named Henry who lives in this beautiful world of Fantasy.
summary:
In a adorable world full of Fantasy and Imagination lives a 13 year old named Henry who lives in this beautiful world of Fantasy. 
 
But not all is pure in this world as it is under attack by a evil villain our Hero Henry is on a mission to stop the incoming madness before it starts and it wont be easy. 
 
Join Henry in this brutal Beat Em Up, Action, Adventure, Open World, Platformer.
